lead_paragraph: Concern about job losses in California led the Navy to limit its base closing list, Navy Secretary John Dalton told the base closing commission today. Mr. Dalton's comments were the clearest statement to date that top Pentagon officials scaled back the closing list not only because of the high initial costs of closing bases but also to protect jobs in the nation's most populous state.

headline.main: California Job Loss Affected Base Closing List
